metadata.title: CVE-2017-15577 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Redmine before 3.2.6 and 3.3.x before 3.3.3 mishandles the rendering ofwiki links, which allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive information.

criterions.comment: redmine: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
